summary: An email from a Special Agent with the Federal Protective Service requesting to review surveillance footage from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) for specific dates related to case 90C-NY-3154599. The agent is coordinating with FBI task force officers to handle the request while on leave.

keyFacts: A Special Agent with the Federal Protective Service is requesting surveillance footage from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) for seven specific dates in 2020.
The request is related to case number 90C-NY-3154599, indicating an ongoing investigation.
Footage from the MCC entry way screening area and visitation rooms is sought for review.
Two FBI Task Force Officers, Mike Lever and Jestin Llewellyn, are designated to handle the request while the primary agent is on leave.
The document shows coordination between the Federal Protective Service and the FBI's Violent Crimes Task Force regarding MCC surveillance.
